# Data references

## Including data files

If your R Markdown scripts load data from external files, courseR can track changes to these files for you and provide automatic download links in output HTML pages.

* To reference external data files, include a header like:

```
data: data/codons
```

* In R blocks, you'll get links:

```{r}
myData <- read.table("data/codons.txt")
```

# Text trimming

## Block quotes are preserved

But you can preserve large text blocks by enclosing them in block quotes (with ">" in markdown):

> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
